install.name: JRedirect
install.author: Ross Farinella
install.description: This plugin allows you to configure specific URLs to redirect to designated pages. The redirection will only happen if the URL entered by your users is within your Joomla! site.

param.name: urls
param.label: Special URLs and their destinations
param.description: Enter entries on their own line in the form special.html|index.php?real_url.html
